What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?
Developing and emerging countries like India, Brazil Etc., have an important role in reviving the global economic conditions. For investors around the world, they eye emerging countries for making their investments as they fetch good returns. Earlier in 2009 when US was under the cloud of recession and had to face a tough time, Indian economy was not affected as its economy was robust. The G.D.P. growth rate of emerging and developing countries is higher then that of the developed countries. Developing countries have formed different groups like BRICKS, ASEAN, SAARC Etc., and are conducting annual meetings with their member nations to overcome the current global economic conditions.
